intro: Psychotria banaona, commonly known as the Banaona Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves. The plant produces small, clustered white flowers with prominent yellow stamens. Its fruits are small berries that turn from green to yellow when mature. Psychotria banaona is often found in moist, shaded forest habitats.
